general_advisory: To manage chemically sprays Thiamethoxam 25% W. G @ 40 gram/acre or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. @ 50 gram/acre or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL @ 60-ml acre...

advisory: There may be chances of Tikka disease in groundnut. Black & nearly circular spots appear on the lower surface of the leaflets of infected plant.
Sugarcane crop is a heavy feeder. Apply 87kg of DAP, 20kg of MOP and 4-ton of FYM at the time of planting in trenches.
Present weather condition favourable for infestation of Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer in Late sown Cauliflower and Cabbage crops.
Present weather condition favourable for infestation of Dimond Back Moth and Head Borer in Late sown Cauliflower and Cabbage crops.
Prevailing fog condition may increase the infestation Aphid.
There are chances of Early Blight disease incidence in Potato.
There is a chance of Epilachna Beetle infestation in Brinjal due to dry weather condition.
Sleeping disease of poultry has been found. Vaccinate the chicks with Lasota at 7 days and with IBD vaccines within 13-15 days.
